Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in uptime-kuma.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.20.0 up to 1.23.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.20.0, all versions after 1.23.6
